dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.sales.compet.intel.CompetitorIntelligenceMarketSegment
dataStructure.description:
A MarketSegment in which a Competitor makes ProductOfferings available.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CompetitorIntelligenceMarketSegment

child.name: plannedEntryDate
child.description:
The date on which the Competitor intends to begin making ProductOfferings available to a MarketSegment.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: plannedEntryDate

child.name: plannedSpending
child.description:
The amount of money that a Competitor intends on spending make ProductOfferings available in a MarketSegment.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: plannedSpending

child.name: plannedMarketCoverage
child.description:
A percent or description that describes the degree to which a Competitor will/does/has extend into a MarketSegment.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: plannedMarketCoverage

child.name: rank
child.description:
The degree of importance or excellence of a Competitor in a MarketSegment relative to other Competitors in the MarketSegment.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: rank

child.name: competitorIntelligence
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CompetitorIntelligenceGatheredFor

This association end is optional
child.label: competitorIntelligence

child.name: marketSegment
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association MarketSegmentCategorizes

This association end is optional
child.label: marketSegment
